summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of Walter the Walker PWA - All core features working perfectly. Tested 15 backend endpoints and complete frontend functionality including authentication, navigation, timer controls, and data integration.

backend_issues.notes: All backend APIs (15/15) passing with proper authentication, data persistence, and Italian responses

frontend_issues.notes: Frontend perfectly integrated with backend. All navigation, authentication, and interactive features working correctly. Walt mascot, Italian UI, and dark theme implemented as specified.

passed_tests: Health endpoint returning correct app info
Auth flow with Emergent Google OAuth architecture
Profile creation and updates with Italian field names
Walk sessions with timer, steps tracking, and data persistence
Circuit sessions with exercise logging
Exercise API with seeded Italian exercise data
Plan generation with age-appropriate workouts for 70-75 age group
Stats API with comprehensive analytics and chart data
Login page with Walt mascot and Google authentication
Home page with personalized Italian greetings and daily plans
Walking page with functional timer controls (start/pause/resume/stop)
Circuit page with exercise selection interface
Stats page displaying analytics with charts
Profile page showing user data and preferences
Bottom navigation between all pages
Session-based authentication working across all pages
Italian language interface throughout
Dark elegant theme implementation
Walt the Goat SVG mascot with animation states
Mobile-first PWA design
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 98% (all core functionality working perfectly)
